text:
Artist: Vincent van Gogh
Description: Dutch painter (1853–1890)

Born: 1853-03-30T00:00:00Z
Died: 1890-07-29T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Kingdom of the Netherlands

Movements: Expressionism, Post-impressionism
Genres: still life, landscape painting, interior view, cityscape, portrait, self-portrait, Christian art
Occupations: printmaker, painter, draftsperson
Fields: art of painting

Influenced By: Anton Mauve, Jean-François Millet, Willem Roelofs, Peter Paul Rubens, Katsushika Hokusai, Paul Cézanne, Paul Gauguin
Notable Works: The Potato Eaters, The Starry Night

Artist: Johannes Vermeer
Description: Dutch painter (1632–1675)

Born: 1632-10-01T00:00:00Z
Died: 1675-01-01T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Dutch Republic

Movements: Dutch Golden Age painting, Baroque painting
Genres: genre painting, portrait, cityscape
Occupations: art dealer, painter, art collector
Fields: art of painting

Influenced By: Leonaert Bramer, Carel Fabritius, Dirck van Baburen, Gabriel Metsu
Notable Works: Diana and her Nymphs, Girl with a Pearl Earring, The Geographer, The Procuress, The Astronomer, View of Delft, The Milkmaid

Artist: Frans Hals
Description: Dutch painter (1580—1666)

Born: 1582-01-01T00:00:00Z
Died: 1666-08-26T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Dutch Republic

Movements: Dutch Golden Age painting, Baroque
Genres: genre painting, portrait painting, schutterstuk
Occupations: printmaker, painter, architectural draftsperson, visual artist
Fields: Unknown

Influenced By: Unknown
Notable Works: Malle Babbe, Laughing Cavalier, Jester with lute, Regents of the Old Men's Almshouse, A Militiaman Holding a Berkemeyer, Known as the ‘Merry Drinker’, Portrait of Dorothea Berck, Laughing boy, The Officers of the St Adrian Militia Company in 1633, The Banquet of the Officers of the St George Militia Company in 1616, Peeckelhaeringh, Two laughing boys with mug of beer, Regentesses of the Old Men's Alms House, Portrait of a young man with a skull, The Officers of the St George Militia Company in 1639, Militia Company of District XI under the Command of Captain Reynier Reael, Merrymakers at Shrovetide, Portrait of Isaak Abrahamsz. Massa, Willem van Heythuysen posing with a sword, Young Man and Woman in an Inn

Artist: Gerard ter Borch
Description: Dutch Golden Age painter (1617–1681)

Born: 1617-01-01T00:00:00Z
Died: 1681-12-08T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Dutch Republic

Movements: Baroque
Genres: genre art, genre painting
Occupations: painter, visual artist
Fields: Unknown

Influenced By: Unknown
Notable Works: Portrait of Helena van der Schalcke, The messenger, The Gallant Conversation, known as Paternal Admonition

Artist: Otto Wacker
Description: German art dealer who became infamous for commissioning and selling forgeries of paintings by Vincent van Gogh (1898-1970)

Born: 1898-08-11T00:00:00Z
Died: 1970-10-13T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Germany

Movements: Unknown
Genres: Unknown
Occupations: art dealer, art historian, art forger
Fields: Unknown

Influenced By: Unknown
Notable Works: Unknown

Artist: Han van Meegeren
Description: Dutch painter and art forger (1889-1947)

Born: 1889-10-10T00:00:00Z
Died: 1947-12-30T00:00:00Z
Citizenship: Kingdom of the Netherlands

Movements: Unknown
Genres: landscape painting
Occupations: counterfeiter, watercolorist, copyist, painter, art forger, restorer, collector, draftsperson
Fields: young adult literature, art of painting

Influenced By: Unknown
Notable Works: The foot washing, Woman reading music, Cisterspelende vrouw
